name: Capella Prime Syandana
description: This graceful cape is the signature Syandana of Banshee Prime.

languages.description: Dieses elegante Cape ist das Syandana der Wahl von Banshee Prime.

languages.description: Cette gracieuse cape est la Syandana emblématique de Banshee Prime.

languages.description: Questo elegante mantello è la Syandana distintiva di Banshee Prime.
languages.name: Syandana Capella Prime

languages.description: 이 우아한 망토는 밴쉬 프라임의 대표 샨다나입니다.
languages.name: 카펠라 프라임 샨다나

languages.description: Esta elegante capa es la syandana distintiva de Banshee Prime.

languages.description: Этот изящный плащ является именной санданой Банши Прайм.

languages.description: ผ้าคลุมที่งดงามนี้เป็นไซอันดานาที่เป็นซิกเนเจอร์ของ Banshee Prime

languages.description: Bu zarif pelerin Banshee Prime'ın özel Syandanasıdır
